repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:20.04

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    build-essential \
    cmake \
    autoconf \
    libtool \
    git \
    vim && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends doxygen -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
